title: STAT+: FDA officials push for long-term monitoring of autoimmune patients receiving CAR-T therapy
description: FDA officials are advising drug developers to study the long-term effects of using CAR-T in autoimmune conditions out of concern the therapies could carry risks.
content: FDA officials are advising drug developers to study the long-term effects of using CAR-T in autoimmune conditions out of concern the therapies could carry risks.
